name: Kara Fighting
description:
Many crafty fighters have been summoned to this place. Here you can find stunning and skillful ninjas from different ancient clans and crafty superheroes from all over the world! Only the best fighter could beat his way to the victory and become a winner or be flushed away like a small obstacle!

Features include:
* Sophisticated 3D characters and large scenes!
* Smooth and intense motion!
* Complete Free to play
